animeDescription: In Kyokujitsu no Kantai, Japan builds up on its success in the earlier series by expanding its blue-water capabilities to reach the Atlantic Ocean, challenging the Kriegsmarine in the process. Nazi Germany also launches a surgical strike on the White House and the Japanese fleet repels a German invasion of Britain.  Source: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Konpeki_no_Kantai
animeStaff: [['Matano Hiromichi', ['Director']], ['Matsuura Noriyoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Okamoto Hideki', ['Episode Director', 'Storyboard', 'Mechanical Design']], ['Takeda Yuuichirou', ['Script']]]
